phrs.translation: 吞食星空, 吞噬星空, 吞噬行星, 吞食天空
噬灵瘟疫, 吞噬疫疠, 吞噬的瘟疫
贪吃的蛆虫, 饕餮的坏人

sentences.sentence: She began buying and devouring newspapers when she was only 12.
sentences.translation: 她才12岁时，就开始买报纸并如饥似渴地阅读。

sentences.sentence: When Colin held forth under his tree old Ben fixed devouring eyes on him and kept them there.
sentences.translation: 当科林在他的树下伸出手来的时候，老本贪婪地盯着他，并一直盯着他。

sentences.sentence: It may not have been ladylike to depict a giant spider devouring a hummingbird, but when Merian did it at the turn of the 18th century, surprisingly, nobody objected.
sentences.translation: 描绘一只巨大蜘蛛吞食蜂鸟的画面，可能不太符合淑女形象，但令人惊讶的是，当梅里安在18世纪之交这样做的时候，没有人对此提出反对。
